name: Word Odyssey V1.3
description:
A fun game inspired by Wordle, where you have to use hints given to you to guess the different word on each line to guess the ultimate word. The game consists of 3 different levels with different words and themes.

Objective: Guess all of the words in a short amount of time

How To Play: Type in a five-letter word and figure out the four-letter word that relates to the theme of the level and is found in the little grid you created

When You Press Enter:

  There are 3 color cases:

    Green = The letter is in the word and in the correct place

    Yellow = The letter is in the word, but is not in the correct place

    Red = The letter is not in the word

Try to beat your own time! Levels have been made so they can be played an infinite amount of times

Goals / Future Updates:

  - Leaderboards

  - Game Saving

  - More Levels

  - Add Mac OS Support

  - Add Linux Support

  - Add Mobile Support

Note:

  This game was created in a week, so please report any bugs you find or any suggestions you have!
